title: location
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: sp
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: species (Ev = Elymus virginicus, Mv = Microstegium vimineum)

title: ID
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: plant ID (A = focal adult, 1 - 3 = focal seedlings, other = background)

title: no_green
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: indicator variable of whether or not plants were missing green leaves

title: infec
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: indicator variable of whether or not at least two lesions were present on at least on leaf of the plant

title: leaves_tot
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller

title: Bp_spots_Ev
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: indicator variable of whether or not Elymus individuals appeared to have Bipolaris infection (leopard-like spots)

title: seeds_collected
all_disease_seeds_late_aug_2018_density_: indicator variable of whether or not seeds were collected
